items.title: Wardley to be world champion as Usyk gives up belt
items.description: Britain's Fabio Wardley is expected to be elevated to WBO heavyweight champion after Oleksandr Usyk decides to relinquish his title.

items.title: England will 'comfortably' win Ashes if Stokes plays full part - Ramprakash
items.description: England will beat Australia "quite comfortably" in the Ashes if captain Ben Stokes is fit enough to play all five Tests, says ex-batter Mark Ramprakas...

items.title: Joshua given offer he simply couldn't refuse - Bunce
items.description: Boxing expert Steve Bunce says Anthony Joshua was given an "offer he simply couldn't refuse" to fight Jake Paul.

items.title: Reselling tickets above face value set to be banned by government
items.description: Ministers are expected to announce the plan to tackle touts and resale sites offering tickets at several times face value.

items.title: From seabirds to sea turtles: the fatal toll of plastic revealed
items.description: A new study pinpoints the deadly thresholds of plastic ingestion for marine life.
